column4: I first had ubuntu with GNOME.. I then installed KDE4 from apt-get. But my GDm misses the KDE entry.. How to add the entry?
did you check the sessions chooser?
how to add an entry? which file? /et/gdm/Session is not found in ubuntu
i have no idea. :) try the 'apt-get install -f' do apply and residual configurations, and make the sessions fileby hand if you think it should be there
